title: New: Star Slinger – They Like It Slow (H-Town/Star Slinger Refix)
body:
![](http://farm6.static.flickr.com/5136/5416973830_78249dc77c_b.jpg "SS")If you’ve been a long follower of _**Crack in the Road**_ then you’ll know how much we love Manchester beat-making maestro **Star Slinger**. If this is your first time hearing of him, then you’re in for a treat! Rapidly garnering a hardcore following both in the UK and abroad, his debut record **_Volume 1_** dropped last year, and since then he’s hardly stopped producing new remixes and tracks, as well as playing a score of shows around Europe. Today he dropped a new remix, set to be included in upcoming live sets, a chilled out, laid back take of **H-Town’s** _They Like It Slow_. Like much of his previous work it maintains a soulful vibe, despite being instantaneously catchy and danceable. Check it out and download below.

 [H-Town – They Like It Slow (Star Slinger Refix)](http://soundcloud.com/starslingeruk/h-town-they-like-it-slow-star) by [Star Slinger](http://soundcloud.com/starslingeruk)
